member.name: T:MasterPagesLib.Content
member.summary: This control contains the content for a particular region

member.name: T:MasterPagesLib.ContentContainer
member.summary: This control serves two distincts purposes: - it marks the location where the Master Page will be inserted into the Page - it contains the various Content sections that will be matched to the Master Page's Region controls (based on their ID's).

member.name: M:MasterPagesLib.ContentContainer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ContentContainer class.

member.name: M:MasterPagesLib.ContentContainer.AddParsedSubObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Only allows controls to be added.

member.name: M:MasterPagesLib.ContentContainer.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the event to load the master page.

member.name: P:MasterPagesLib.ContentContainer.MasterPageFile
member.summary: The path to MasterPage that specifies the layout used to render the contained content.

member.name: T:MasterPagesLib.NoBugForm
member.summary: A server form that does not cause a problem by being inside a master page or other naming container.
member.remarks: When using this version of masterpages with asp.net 1.1, use this form instead of the standard form element for server forms. This is only required because of a bug in asp.net 1.1's version of __doPostBack.

member.name: M:MasterPagesLib.NoBugForm.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the NoBugForm class.

member.name: T:MasterPagesLib.Region
member.summary: The control marks a place holder for content in a master page.

member.name: P:MasterPagesLib.Region.ID
member.summary: Overrides to register regions as they are created.
